import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import AOS from 'aos'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css'; import '../styles/AdminDashboard.css'; function AdminDashboard() { useEffect(() => { AOS.init({ duration: 1000 }); }, []); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', bio: '', fullBio: '', image: '', bannerImage: '', popularWork: '', workLink: '', twitter: '', instagram: '', positionTitle: '', companyName: '', experienceSummary: '', projectDescription: '', githubLink: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // TODO: Implement backend integration to save formData console.log('Form submitted:', formData); }; return (
